name: Finflx Holding Limited
description: Developer of a cloud-based platform designed to provide them with the tools to understand their finances. The company's platform offers efficient contributions' management by employers to their employees' gratuity plans in accordance with DIFC employment law and offers a platform to support savings goals, financial freedom and empowering employees, enabling employers to attract and retain talented employees by offering a proper EOSB plan in a convenient, transparent, and cost-effective way.
one_liner: Developer of a cloud-based platform designed to provide them with the tools to understand their finances. The company's platform offers efficient contributions' management by employers to their employees' gratuity plans in accordance with DIFC employment law and offers a platform to support savings goals, financial freedom and empowering employees, enabling employers to attract and retain talented employees by offering a proper EOSB plan in a convenient, transparent, and cost-effective way.
